amendment.description: To establish the effect of a section of the United States Code relating to the letting of contracts on individual contributions to political campaigns, and to require the Secretary of Transportation to consider State laws that limit political contributions to be in accordance with competitive procurement requirements.

action.text: Amendment SA 606 proposed by Senator Corzine to Amendment SA 605.
Motion to table amendment SA 606 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 57 - 40. Record Vote Number: 119.
